reviews.review_msg: He is exceptionally knowledgeable, so talk to him during his office hours.

Dr. Donaldson is a great prof! This course is a bit hard to understand but do the readings & you'll be fine. Lectures help you understand & very interesting topics as well! There are weekly assignments, 2 papers, and a final. Tutorials were fun too because the discussions were interesting & TA explained well. Great prof & class. Highly recommend!
i love him omg!! best at sfu
Professional teaching with clear logic. However, you should do all the readings  and remember all the details in order to get a good grade.
Most confusing class! 2  term papers,  first topic was alright second one was super confusing! Mid Term class average was low.. Don't take this class if you don't have to

She's a hilarious professor and one of my favourites that I've had at SFU - that said she makes jokes at the expense of about 70% of her class almost every day. Most of the people in this 200+ person class appear to have zero logical reasoning skills and expect an easy grade however, so it seems justified. iClicker questions so attend lecture.

Never had such a condescending professor. Never had such an unorganized professor. Never had such a boring professor. So, unless you're interested in having a condescending, unorganized, and boring professor--stay away.
